ourmission-about.heading: E-Literacy for Empowerment
ourmission-about.description: E-literacy is more than education—it's emotions and empowerment. At Durga Foundation, we nurture tomorrow’s leaders through digital skills.

ourmission-about.heading: Digital Workstations
ourmission-about.description: Empowering minds through access—Durga Foundation’s workstations are where learning meets opportunity.

ourmission-about.heading: Career Counseling
ourmission-about.description: Career counseling at Durga Foundation lights the path for youth, turning dreams into reality.

ourvalues-global.heading: Giving Back to Society
ourvalues-global.description: We uplift communities by creating opportunities. Former beneficiaries now mentor others, extending education and support where it’s needed most.

ourvalues-global.heading: Equal Opportunity for All
ourvalues-global.description: We bridge gaps of geography, gender, and income—ensuring every child has equal access to education, technology, and opportunities.

ourvalues-global.heading: The Power of Working Together
ourvalues-global.description: Collaboration fuels our mission. Volunteers, educators, and donors unite to amplify impact and sustainably transform entire communities.

ourvalues-global.heading: Student First
ourvalues-global.description: Every decision centers on student needs. We foster academic, emotional, and personal growth to develop future-ready, confident leaders.

ourjourney-about.title: The Inception: A Vision Takes Root
ourjourney-about.description: The Durga Foundation was born out of a mission to uplift underprivileged students by providing access to quality education, career guidance, and resources. What started as a grassroots initiative soon evolved into a structured platform for youth empowerment in rural India.

ourjourney-about.title: Scholarships & Resources for Aspiring Change-Makers
ourjourney-about.description: We began offering scholarships to meritorious students, ensuring that financial barriers would never hold back potential. The same year, we donated critical academic resources—books and study material—to support IIT-JEE and NEET aspirants in government and low-income schools.

ourjourney-about.title: Digital Literacy & Career Guidance Begin
ourjourney-about.description: We introduced the 'Moose to Mouse' digital literacy program, equipping students with basic computer knowledge in villages unfamiliar with technology. Simultaneously, we launched career counseling drives to help young learners explore academic and vocational paths confidently. Related program: E-Literacy for All.

ourjourney-about.title: Building Knowledge & Infrastructure
ourjourney-about.description: Village libraries expanded, creating safe spaces for children to read, research, and imagine a better future. We also laid the foundation stone for our first community center, envisioned to host skill-based training, digital classes, and youth development workshops.

ourjourney-about.title: Resilience Through Innovation and Support
ourjourney-about.description: During the pandemic, we introduced virtual classes to ensure uninterrupted learning. We also offered soft loans to financially stressed families, helping them stay afloat with dignity and hope.

ourjourney-about.title: Engagement & Empowerment
ourjourney-about.description: Our founder engaged with Dr. Harsh Vardhan to explore future-focused STEM education in rural India. We also hosted a residential boot camp focusing on leadership skills, academic excellence, and emotional intelligence for teens.

ourjourney-about.title: E-Literacy Revolution Begins
ourjourney-about.description: Launched across five villages in Kushinagar, our E-Literacy Program introduced hundreds of students and villagers to digital knowledge, internet safety, and tech usage, aiming to bridge the rural digital divide.

ourjourney-about.title: Scaling District-Wide Impact
ourjourney-about.description: The digital literacy campaign expanded from five villages to district-wide in Kushinagar, benefiting thousands. The initiative ensured inclusive access to computers, internet training, and awareness for school children, women, and senior citizens.

ourjourney-about.title: Future-Ready Vision
ourjourney-about.description: Durga Foundation continues its growth with training programs, career readiness, and tech-driven education. Our community center nears completion, soon to house a digital learning lab, women’s skill center, and rural innovation hub.

programs-ourprograms.title: Scholarship Program
programs-ourprograms.description: Monthly scholarships (₹500–₹3,000) to support students in rural India, especially girls, reducing school dropouts by easing financial burdens and empowering families to pursue higher education.

programs-ourprograms.title: Career Counselling
programs-ourprograms.description: Psychometric testing, career exploration, and guidance for Classes 9–12 students, especially girls, enabling informed choices and connecting them with mentorship circles.

programs-ourprograms.title: Competitive Exam Preparation
programs-ourprograms.description: Academic resources, mentoring, and coaching for government exams (SSC, banking, railway) with structured preparation and peer learning opportunities.

programs-ourprograms.title: E-Literacy Program
programs-ourprograms.description: Teaches rural youth essential digital skills (typing, email, internet) to bridge the digital divide for learning, communication, and job applications.

programs-ourprograms.title: Software Engineering Program
programs-ourprograms.description: Training in coding, web development, and problem-solving to open tech career pathways with hands-on learning and job readiness support.

programs-ourprograms.title: Spoken English & Advanced Communication
programs-ourprograms.description: Develops professional communication skills through role-plays and presentations, boosting fluency for interviews and workplace success.

programs-ourprograms.title: DF Workstation
programs-ourprograms.description: Employment preparation with resume building, interview training, and job referrals to address rural employment gaps.

programs-ourprograms.title: Entrepreneurial Training Program
programs-ourprograms.description: Nurtures business ideas through workshops and financial literacy, promoting self-employment and local enterprise creation.

programs-ourprograms.title: Moose to Mouse Program
programs-ourprograms.description: Engages students in science and robotics through hands-on experiments to inspire STEM exploration and innovation.

image.alt: Students supported by Durga Foundation Scholarship

accordion.title: Program Overview and Details
accordion.content:
The Durga Foundation Scholarship Program is committed to empowering talented students, especially girls, from underprivileged backgrounds who face financial and guidance-related challenges in pursuing education. We believe every child deserves the chance to learn, grow, and succeed regardless of their circumstances.
Our scholarship supports education across various fields including MBA, MBBS, B.Tech, Diplomas, and more. Beyond funding education, we provide mentorship and guidance to help students build successful careers and become changemakers in their communities.
Currently, the program supports hundreds of students from rural and semi-urban areas, and we are on track to extend our support to 500 beneficiaries in the near future.

accordion.title: Success Stories & Impact
accordion.content:
Over hundreds of students supported to continue and complete their education.
Alumni have graduated in diverse fields such as MBA, MBBS, B.Tech, and Diploma courses.
Many beneficiaries now hold prominent roles in multinational companies.
Creating future leaders, professionals, and social changemakers.
Expanding reach to impact 500 students soon.

accordion.title: How to Apply
accordion.content:
🎓 Are you a student needing financial support to continue your education?
👉 Click Here criteria and application process are simple and transparent to ensure maximum outreach.

accordion.title: How to Sponsor a Student
accordion.content:
Your support can transform a student’s life by funding their education and unlocking their potential.👉 Donate Now
Become a sponsor and help us nurture the leaders of tomorrow. Every contribution counts!

image.alt: Career counselling sessions by Durga Foundation

accordion.title: Program Overview and Details
accordion.content:
The Career Counselling Program by Durga Foundation is designed to help students—especially girls and youth from under-resourced communities—make informed and confident career decisions.
Targeted at students in Classes 9 to 12, the program equips them with the knowledge, tools, and mentorship they need to navigate their educational and professional journeys.
We deliver sessions through school-based workshops and community outreach, ensuring accessibility even in rural and semi-urban regions.

accordion.title: Program Highlights
accordion.content:
🔍 Psychometric Assessments
Identify strengths, interests, and career compatibility through expert-designed tests.

📚 Career Awareness Workshops
Explore a wide range of career options—healthcare, technology, entrepreneurship, public service, and more.

🛠️ Skill-Building Sessions
Learn essential life and career skills like resume writing, interview techniques, communication, and planning.

👩‍🏫 Mentorship & Role Models
Ongoing support and guidance from professionals and industry mentors who inspire and lead by example.

accordion.title: Success Stories & Impact
accordion.content:
🎯 Reached thousands of students across rural and semi-urban areas in hundreds of schools.
✅ Helped students gain clarity on career paths aligned with their aspirations.
👩 Empowered girls and first-generation learners to envision successful futures.
🤝 Building a growing network of trained mentors and partner schools.
📈 Goal: Reach thousands more in the coming years.

accordion.title: Join Us Today
accordion.content:
👩‍🎓 Students
Looking for direction in your career journey?
👉 Register now to plan your future with confidence.

🏫 Schools & Educators
Want to bring impactful career guidance to your students?
👉 Partner with us to offer our counselling program in your institution.

page.title: Competitive Exam Preparation Program
page.subtitle: Empowering Youth to Ace Competitive Exams

accordion.title: Program Overview and Details
accordion.content: The Competitive Exam Preparation Program by Durga Foundation is dedicated to supporting youth from underserved communities in preparing for key competitive exams such as NDA, CDS, CUET, JEE, and NCET. Our program combines high-quality study materials, expert guidance, and mentorship to help students develop effective strategies, sharpen their skills, and build the confidence needed to succeed.

accordion.title: Resources and Personalized Support
accordion.content:
📚 Access to a wide range of study books, practice papers, and online test subscriptions tailored to various competitive exams

🎯 Personalized coaching and exam strategies by experienced mentors

📈 Regular progress tracking to ensure steady improvement

🌍 Focus on students from rural and underserved areas

accordion.title: Why Join Our Program?
accordion.content:
✅ Extensive study materials and online resources
✅ One-on-one mentorship and career guidance
✅ Test-taking strategies and confidence-building sessions
✅ Special focus on youth from rural and underserved communities

Our mission is to help young aspirants clear competitive exams and unlock promising career opportunities in government, defense, engineering, and beyond.

accordion.title: Get Started with Your Exam Preparation
accordion.content:
🎓 Register as a Student
Ready to boost your exam preparation with expert support?
👉 Join Now

Partner with Us
Bring competitive exam coaching to your community.
👉 Become a Partner

page.title: E-Literacy Program for Students
page.subtitle: Digital Skills Training by Durga Foundation

image.alt: Students learning computer skills under the E-Literacy Program

accordion.title: Program Overview and Details
accordion.content:
In today’s rapidly evolving digital world, essential computer and internet skills are crucial—especially for students from rural and underserved communities. The E-Literacy Program by Durga Foundation aims to bridge the digital divide by empowering young learners, particularly girls, with practical knowledge in:

🖥️ Computer basics
🌐 Internet navigation
🔐 Digital safety
📋 Productivity tools

Our hands-on workshops in government schools and community centers enable students to confidently explore technology, unlocking new educational and employment opportunities.

accordion.title: Our Mission
accordion.content: To build a digitally literate generation equipped not only for education, employment, and self-reliance, but also to foster digital empowerment, critical thinking, and safe online behavior. We strive to bridge the digital divide by ensuring equal access to technology, especially for girls and underserved communities, enabling youth to confidently navigate the digital world, innovate, and contribute positively to society.

accordion.title: Program Impact & Success Stories
accordion.content:
🌟 2500+ students trained across rural schools
📈 75% of participants report improved digital confidence
👩‍💻 Girls’ enrollment increased by 60%, empowering young women in tech

Testimonial
"Before this program, I was scared to use a computer. Now, I can confidently browse the internet, create documents, and even help my friends learn! This training changed my life."
— Anita Singh, Program Participant

accordion.title: Get Involved
accordion.content:
Register Now as a Student
Eager to learn digital skills and explore the online world with confidence?
👉 Click here to register

Register Your School
Want to bring digital literacy training to your students?
👉 Click here to enroll your school

page.title: Software Engineering Program
page.subtitle: Step into the world of technology and innovation

image.alt: Students learning software engineering with Durga Foundation

accordion.title: Program Overview and Details
accordion.content:
Step into the world of technology and innovation with the Software Engineering Program by Durga Foundation.
Designed for aspiring tech professionals, this program equips students with industry-relevant technical skills and a strong foundation for careers in software development, IT, and emerging tech fields.

accordion.title: Key Topics Covered
accordion.content:
🎯 Programming Fundamentals
💻 Java Programming
🗄️ Database Management Systems (DBMS)
🧮 Oracle & SQL
🌐 Web Development
☁️ Cloud Computing & Kubernetes
🛠️ Project-Based Learning & Real-World Applications

accordion.title: Learn from Industry Experts
accordion.content:
Our experienced facilitators bring hands-on knowledge and mentorship to guide you through every step with practical insights, real-world challenges, and job-ready training:

👨‍🏫 Mr. Aman Garg
👨‍🏫 Mr. Vinayak Awasthi

page.title: Advanced English Program
page.subtitle: Speak with Confidence. Write with Impact. Work with Excellence.

image.alt: Students learning English at Durga Foundation

accordion.title: Program Overview and Details
accordion.content:
The Advanced English Program empowers youth to master spoken and written English—enhancing their academic success and employability.

Through interactive sessions, real-life practice, and confidence-building activities, participants will:

✅ Develop fluency & vocabulary
✅ Improve grammar & writing skills
✅ Build professional communication skills
✅ Prepare for interviews & workplace success

accordion.title: Expert Facilitator
accordion.content:
👩‍🏫 Mrs. Neeru Batra
Led by experienced educator Mrs. Neeru Batra, the program focuses on communicative English, making students job-ready and confident in real-world environments.

accordion.title: Program Impact
accordion.content:
Over 100+ youth have been successfully placed in jobs through the Advanced English Program.

Some inspiring success stories:

🌟 Deepika Mall – Successfully placed in a reputed job
🌟 Sanjay – Working at Amazon
🌟 Yadav Pooja Yogendra – Now working as a Teacher

Their achievements reflect the program's real-world impact on lives and livelihoods.

page.title: DF Workstation – Youth Employment in the Service Sector
page.subtitle: An Initiative by Durga Foundation

image.alt: Youth engaged in service sector employment under DF Workstation

accordion.title: Program Overview and Details
accordion.content: DF Workstation connects youth from developing cities with skill-based job placements in the service industry. In partnership with companies like Constems AI and Ibrandriser Private Limited, we provide career readiness training and employment opportunities to empower young talent.

accordion.title: Our Mission
accordion.content:
To empower youth from developing cities by providing industry-relevant skills, career readiness training, and meaningful job placements in the service sector. We aim to create a pathway for economic independence, professional growth, and sustainable livelihoods.

Through partnerships with forward-thinking companies, we strive to build a strong workforce that supports local economies, reduces unemployment, and transforms lives—targeting 100 job placements in 3 years as a milestone towards broader social impact.

accordion.title: Program Impact
accordion.content:
So far, 10 youth have joined our journey, taking their first steps toward career success, with many more ready to follow. Early participants include:

• Vartika
• Aditi
• Ajit
• Dilip
…and many more passionate young people gearing up for their future!

accordion.title: Get Started Today
accordion.content:
Register as a Youth
Gain training and job placement opportunities in the service sector.
👉 Register Here

Register as a Company
Hire skilled, trained youth ready to contribute to your business.
👉 Register Here

image.alt: Youth participating in Durga Foundation's Entrepreneurship Program

accordion.title: Program Overview and Details
accordion.content:
The Entrepreneurship Program by Durga Foundation empowers young minds—especially from underserved communities—to become job creators rather than job seekers.
Through experiential learning, real-world exposure, and continuous mentorship, we help youth develop the mindset, skills, and confidence to build sustainable ventures and drive change in their communities.
The program is customized for different student groups, considering their backgrounds, needs, and aspirations.

accordion.title: Key Learning Areas
accordion.content:
💡 Idea Generation & Validation
Learn how to identify problems, generate innovative solutions, and validate them in real-world contexts.

📈 Business Planning & Strategy
Understand how to build a business model, define goals, and create execution roadmaps.

💰 Financial Literacy & Budgeting
Gain practical skills in money management, investment planning, and budgeting for small businesses.

🌐 Digital Marketing & Branding
Learn to promote your idea using digital tools, social media, and content strategies.

📚 Real-World Case Studies & Mentorship
Learn from successful entrepreneurs and receive guidance to shape your journey.

🌱 Leadership & Personal Growth
Develop confidence, communication, and problem-solving skills essential for any entrepreneur.

accordion.title: Programs Under the Entrepreneurship Umbrella
accordion.content:
🔧 Industrial Training Program
Duration: 7 Days | Focus: Business Exposure & Operations
Immersive training in real business environments
Understanding of daily operations, logistics, and customer engagement

🔥 Leadership Boot Camp
Duration: 5 Days | Focus: Youth Development & Leadership
Activities around teamwork, innovation, and vision-building
Builds personal resilience, strategic thinking, and leadership qualities

accordion.title: Success Stories & Impact
accordion.content:
💼 Built entrepreneurial mindsets in hundreds of rural and semi-urban youth.
🚀 Enabled first-time entrepreneurs to ideate and launch local businesses.
🌍 Fostered a generation of youth leaders who are driving community change.
🎯 Goal: Expand access to entrepreneurship learning for thousands more.

accordion.title: Register for the Program
accordion.content:
🚀 Are you ready to start your journey as a changemaker?
👉 Click here to register for the Entrepreneurship Program

image.alt: Mushar youth learning digital skills under the Moose to Mouse program

accordion.title: About the Program
accordion.content: The Moose to Mouse Program by Durga Foundation is a pioneering initiative dedicated to empowering youth from the Mushar community through essential digital literacy and computer skills training. Inspired by the symbolic transformation from a “Moose” (rat) to a “Mouse” (computer mouse), this program breaks traditional barriers and opens doors to the digital job market.

accordion.title: Program Overview
accordion.content: We focus on equipping Mushar youth with the skills needed to thrive in today’s tech-driven workplace. Through hands-on computer training, digital literacy workshops, and job readiness sessions, participants gain the confidence and expertise required for sustainable careers.

accordion.title: What We Offer
accordion.content:
• Basic to Advanced Computer Skills
• Digital Literacy and Online Safety
• Job Readiness & Career Guidance
• Mentoring and Support Networks

This comprehensive approach ensures students not only learn technology but also understand how to apply it effectively in real-world job scenarios.

accordion.title: Join the Digital Revolution
accordion.content:
Register as a Participant
Ready to gain digital skills and access new career opportunities?
👉 Sign Up Here

Partner with Us
Help us extend digital literacy to more Mushar youth by collaborating with Durga Foundation.
👉 Partner Now
